up.fe.liacc.repacl

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • up.fe.liacc.repacl.Agent

  • public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    Agents that implement this interface are able to use RepACL to communicate using ACL messages.
    Author:
    joaolopes

    • Constructor Detail

      • Agent

        public Agent()

    • Method Detail

      • addMail

        public void addMail(ACLMessage message)
        Add a message to this agent's mail box. The message should be then scheduled for later processing. To send messages to an agent, the behavior classes make use of the MTS service.
        Parameters:
        message -

      • getMail

        public java.util.LinkedList<ACLMessage> getMail()
        Returns this agent's mail box contents.

      • getMail

        public java.util.LinkedList<ACLMessage> getMail(ACLMessage template)
        Returns this agent's mail box contents.

      • setAID

        public void setAID(int aid)
        Sets the agent identifier. It is expected that agents know their own AID. For instance, the DF class makes use of this when the agents are registered. Without the AID, no communication can occur.
        Parameters:
        AID - The agent identifier

      • getAID

        public int getAID()
        Returns the agent identifier. It is expected that agents know their own AID. For instance, the DF class makes use of this when the agents are registered. Without the AID, no communication can occur.
        Returns:
        The agent identifier
